modules.name: Modulo
modules.description: Adjustable modulo operator for octave-stripping and waveshaping.

modules.name: Opabinia
modules.description: Primitive bassdrum, also accepts audio input for distortion and waveshaping.

modules.name: Splitterburst
modules.description: Tempo multiplier and gate generator, perfect for snare-rushes.

modules.name: Hallucigenia
modules.description: Evolving, mutating random sequencer with memory - ideal for generative patches!

modules.name: Ichneumonid
modules.description: Switch randomly (or deterministically) between signals without creating discontinuities.

modules.name: Meganeura
modules.description: Tempo multipliers - ideal for making Speedcore.
